text: I just did something i regret I had to miss school today and had to join the zoom call for the class  and my science teacher joked with me and said  oh did you skip because it was rainy out  and me not paying attention said  yeah  and then realized what she said and well i had to joke back to my teacher in front of the class and the call i said  oh no im just kidding i missed because i was sick it might not be a big deal but it wad social interaction with my teacher and i did not like it
summary: Today I had to join the zoom call for the class because I missed school because I was sick. My science teacher joked with me because it was rainy out and I didn't pay attention. I did not like the social interaction with her.
cleaned: today join zoom class miss school sick science teacher joke rainy not pay attention not like social interaction
